Control.Name: Label
Control.Tooltip: Will simply put "ms" after the number.

Control.Name: Label
Control.Tooltip: Will color the text the same as the orb. If off the text color will be used.

Control.Name: Label
Control.Tooltip: Will smoothly transition colors between the thresholds. Below threshold 1 is green, 2 is yellow and above 3 is red.

Control.Name: Label
Control.Tooltip: Sets how often the latency is visually updated.

Control.Name: Label
Control.Tooltip: The time in milliseconds that the color will stay green until it hits the second threshold.

Control.Name: Label
Control.Tooltip: The time in milliseconds where the color will transition (if enabled) to yellow. If color transition is disabled it will turn yellow as soon as you're above threshold 1.

Control.Name: Label
Control.Tooltip: The time in milliseconds for when the color will turn red when the latency is above this. If color transition is enabled it will transition from yellow to red according to the difference from threshold 2.
